area.key: Change the backoffice access URL and/or secure your backoffice access URL via IP restrictions
The URL used to access the CMS
Any URL(s) which should not be blocked. For Example /umbraco/surface
This can be any valid combination of letters and/or numbers, non-case sensitive. You cannot use white space, symbols or special characters
Invalid Url, please provide a valid relative Url i.e. /404
Invalid Url, please provide a valid relative Url. i.e. /umbraco/surface
